Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • checkmate.logic.game.Validator

  • public class Validator
extends Object
    Class for validating moves and situations in the game.
    Author:
    llmlks

                                 Square to)
        Checks whether the move of piece p to square to is valid.
        Parameters:
        p - Piece under inspection
        to - Square where piece would be moved to
        Returns:
        true if move is valid, false otherwise

      • hasValidMoves

        public final boolean hasValidMoves(Player player)
        Checks through all player's pieces if any have valid moves left.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to be inspected
        Returns:
        true if any of player's pieces has at least one valid move

      • validMoves

        public final ArrayList<Square> validMoves(Piece p)
        Checks every square on board whether p can be moved to it according to chess rules.
        Parameters:
        p - Piece for which valid moves are searched for
        Returns:
        List of squares where piece p can move to

      • gameEnded

        public final boolean gameEnded()
        Checks whether both players have valid moves and haven't lost their kings.
        Returns:
        true if either of the players is out of valid moves

      • playersInCheck

        public final boolean playersInCheck()
        Checks at the end of the game whether it is a checkmate or a stalemate.
        Returns:
        true if either player is checked.
